name: Data collected during the expeditions of the e-learning projects Expedition Zeeleeuw and Planet Ocean
description: During the expeditions of the e-learningprojects Expeditie Zeeleeuw and Planet Ocean,high school students come on board the researchvessel and are introduced to the marine lifeof the Belgianpart of the North Sea (BCP). Four dayslong, the water column and bottom of the BCPare sampled, respectively with beam trawl or otter trawland a Van Veengrab. All samples are processed on board.

Four dayslong, the water column and bottom of the BCPare sampled, respectively with beam trawl or otter trawland a Van Veengrab. All samples are processed on board.
